overview: The citizens of Gothum City are under attack by smut filmmakers and only one hero can help! Bat Pussy (Dora Dildo) hangs out in her secret headquarters (aka an outhouse). When her “twat begins to twitch,” warning her of imminent crime, Bat Pussy hops on her Holy Hippity-Hop to foil the grotesque sex schemes of un-happily married couple Buddy and Sam. Considered to be the first adult film parody, BAT PUSSY is a sublime-yet-nightmarish extraterrestrial experience made by outlaw filmmakers who remain unidentified to this day.
title: Bat Pussy
